attributeDefinition: indicating the yard (front or back of the residence) where the survey was conducted
approximate (perceived) social class of the surrounding area
yard orderliness (placement of plants, riverbed, etc.)
presence of a porch or patio
presence of cars in the yard
presence of a landscaped rock river
amount of yard covered by grass
density of weeds in the grassy area
density of weeds in the non-grassy area
are there weeds in other area of the yard (e.g. flower beds, driveway, etc.)
indication of pruning trees (e.g., cut branches)
indication of pruning shrubs (e.g., shaped shrubs)
estimated area (as percent) of living grass in grassy area of yard
estimated area (as percent) of bare ground in grassy area of yard
estimated area (as percent) of dead grass in grassy area of yard
estimated area (as percent) of weeds in grassy area of yard
estimated area (as percent) of other in grassy area of yard
percent of living grass in grassy area of yard that is very green (no stress)
percent of living grass in grassy area of yard that is moderately green (little stress)
percent of living grass in grassy area of yard that is greenish-yellow (some stress)
percent of living grass in grassy area of yard that is yellowish (moderate stress)
percent of living grass in grassy area of yard that is brownish (severe stress)
